main_definition: In order of the standard sequence of letters in the alphabet, usually referring to arranging items based on their starting letter.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to or involving an arrangement by the first letter of each word.
meanings_and_examples.example: She organized her bookshelf alphabetically, so it's easy to find any title.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In sequential order according to the position of letters in the alphabet from A to Z.
meanings_and_examples.example: When listing names on a guest list, they were arranged alphabetically by surname.

meanings_and_examples.definition: As per the standard sequence of the English alphabet; without any variation or exceptions.
meanings_and_examples.example: The index at the end of the book is organized in an alphabetical order.
